summary: This document is an overdraft notice from Fifth Third Bank addressed to Vickers Investments LLC, informing them of an overdraft occurrence on their account. The notice details the amount overdrawn, the fees waived, and urges the account holder to make a deposit to avoid further fees.

persons.name: P. Brian Moore
persons.context: P. Brian Moore is identified as the Senior Vice President of Fifth Third Bank, who signed the overdraft notice.

persons.name: Vickers Investments LLC
persons.context: Vickers Investments LLC is the entity that received the overdraft notice from Fifth Third Bank.

events.title: Overdraft Occurrence
events.description: Vickers Investments LLC's account was overdrawn by $46.82.

keyFacts: Vickers Investments LLC's account was overdrawn by $46.82 on October 1, 2013.
Fifth Third Bank waived $37.00 in overdraft fees as a courtesy for this occurrence.
The account holder was advised to make a deposit by October 8, 2013, to avoid further fees.
